original_title: Maybe We Can Go to Hollywood
overview: Tells the tale of Philly punk legend Mikey Wild & local filmmaker Isaac Williams as they set out to pay cinematic tribute to classic horror films. Fighting illness & armed with a budget of $178, these two mavericks do their damnedest to make it “scary”. Included in the running time is the short the group is working, "Paying The Price".
title: Maybe We Can Go to Hollywood
